mapper.select: SELECT A.NOTE_ID , (SELECT TRNSMITER_ID FROM COMTN_NOTE_TRNSMIT WHERE NOTE_ID = A.NOTE_ID LIMIT 1 ) AS "trnsmiterOrgId" , (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTN_EMPLYR_INFO WHERE EMPLYR_ID = (SELECT TRNSMITER_ID FROM COMTN_NOTE_TRNSMIT WHERE NOTE_ID = A.NOTE_ID LIMIT 1) ) AS "trnsmiterNm" , (SELECT EMPLYR_ID FROM COMTN_EMPLYR_INFO WHERE EMPLYR_ID = (SELECT TRNSMITER_ID FROM COMTN_NOTE_TRNSMIT WHERE NOTE_ID = A.NOTE_ID LIMIT 1) ) AS "trnsmiterId" , DATE_FORMAT((SELECT FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTN_NOTE_TRNSMIT WHERE NOTE_ID = A.NOTE_ID LIMIT 1),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS "trnsmiterPnttm" , A.NOTE_SJ AS "noteSj" , A.NOTE_CN AS "noteCn" FROM COMTN_NOTE A WHERE A.NOTE_ID = #{noteId}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTN_EMPLYR_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND USER_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND EMPLYR_ID LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND OFFM_TELNO LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
